verbs.description: Ivanka Trump 's brand [V: is] being secretly sold under the name of " Adrienne Vittadini Studio " — without the knowledge of the first daughter 's company .
Ivanka Trump 's brand is [V: being] secretly sold under the name of " Adrienne Vittadini Studio " — without the knowledge of the first daughter 's company .

[ARG1: Ivanka Trump 's brand] is being [ARGM-MNR: secretly] [V: sold] [ARGM-MNR: under the name of " Adrienne Vittadini Studio "] — [ARGM-MNR: without the knowledge of the first daughter 's company] .
